async app.crud.delete_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)[source]¶
async app.crud.get_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)[source]¶
async app.crud.get_contact_by_id(contact_id: int, user: User, db: AsyncSession) → Contact | None[source]¶

Отримати контакт за ідентифікатором.

Parameters:

  • contact_id – Ідентифікатор контакту

  • user – Поточний користувач

  • db – Сесія бази даних

Returns:

Об’єкт Contact або None

__init__(**kwargs)¶

A simple constructor that allows initialization from kwargs.

Sets attributes on the constructed instance using the names and values in kwargs.

Only keys that are present as attributes of the instance’s class are allowed. These could be, for example, any mapped columns or relationships.
